wiki.content:
Lush Life is a 1958 album by jazz musician John Coltrane.
 
 [edit] Personnel
 Recorded May 31, 1957 August 16, 1957 and January 10, 1958 in Hackensack, NJ.
 
 John Coltrane — tenor saxophone 
 Donald Byrd — trumpet (track 4) 
 Red Garland — piano (tracks 4-5) 
 Earl May — bass (tracks 1-3) 
 Paul Chambers — bass (tracks 4-5) 
 Art Taylor — drums (track 1-3) 
 Louis Hayes — drums (track 4) 
 Albert Heath — drums (track 5) 
 
 [edit] Track listing
 Original LP release Lush Life, 1960 (Prestige) 
 Track
 
 "Like Someone in Love" — 5:00 
 "I Love You" — 5:33 
 "Trane's Slo Blues" — 6:05 
 "Lush Life" — 14:00 
 "I Hear a Rhapsody" — 6:01 
 Track 5 recorded in May 1957 (Coltrane, backed by the Red Garland trio). Tracks 1-3 recorded August 1957 (by the "John Coltrane trio"). Track 4 recorded in early 1958 (quintet featuring Donald Byrd.)
